properties.description: This initiative includes audit and virtual machine extension deployment policies that address a subset of Australian Government Information Security Manual(ISM) controls. Additional policies will be added in upcoming releases. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/AustralianGovernmentISM-blueprint.

metadata.displayName: Include Arc connected servers for Guest Configuration policies
metadata.description: Optionally choose to audit settings inside Arc connected servers using Guest Configuration policies. By selecting this option, you agree to be charged monthly per Arc connected machine.

metadata.displayName: List of users excluded from Windows VM Administrators group
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of members that should be excluded in the Administrators local group. Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: Log Analytics Workspace Id that VMs should be configured for
metadata.description: This is the Id (GUID) of the Log Analytics Workspace that the VMs should be configured for.

metadata.displayName: Vulnerability Assessment settings for SQL server should contain an email address to receive scan reports
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of Vulnerability Assessment settings for SQL server should contain an email address to receive scan reports

metadata.displayName: Adaptive Network Hardening recommendations should be applied on internet facing virtual machines
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of Internet-facing virtual machines for Network Security Group traffic hardening recommendations

metadata.displayName: There should be more than one owner assigned to your subscription
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of minimum owners in subscription

metadata.displayName: Disk encryption should be applied on virtual machines
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring for VM disk encryption

metadata.displayName: Remote debugging should be turned off for Function App
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of remote debugging for Function App

metadata.displayName: Transparent Data Encryption on SQL databases should be enabled
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of unencrypted SQL databases

metadata.displayName: Vulnerability assessment should be enabled on SQL Managed Instance
metadata.description: Audit each SQL Managed Instance which doesn't have recurring vulnerability assessment scans enabled. Vulnerability assessment can discover, track, and help you remediate potential database vulnerabilities.

metadata.displayName: An Azure Active Directory administrator should be provisioned for SQL servers
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of an Azure AD admininistrator for SQL server

metadata.displayName: Only secure connections to your Redis Cache should be enabled
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of resource logs in Azure Redis Cache

metadata.displayName: Endpoint protection solution should be installed on virtual machine scale sets
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of virtual machine scale sets endpoint protection monitoring

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of VM images that have supported Windows OS to add to scope
metadata.description: Example value: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of VM images that have supported Linux OS to add to scope
metadata.description: Example value: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: Audit unrestricted network access to storage accounts
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of network access to storage account

metadata.displayName: Vulnerabilities in security configuration on your virtual machine scale sets should be remediated
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of virtual machine scale sets OS vulnerabilities monitoring

metadata.displayName: Secure transfer to storage accounts should be enabled
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of secure transfer to storage account

metadata.displayName: Adaptive Application Controls should be enabled on virtual machines
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of allowed application list in Azure Security Center

metadata.displayName: A maximum of 3 owners should be designated for your subscription
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of maximum owners in subscription

metadata.displayName: A vulnerability assessment solution should be enabled on your virtual machines
metadata.description: Enable or disable the detection of virtual machine vulnerabilities by Azure Security Center vulnerability assessment

metadata.displayName: CORS should not allow every resource to access your Web Application
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of CORS restrictions for Web Application

metadata.displayName: External accounts with write permissions should be removed from your subscription
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of external acounts with write permissions in subscription

metadata.displayName: Deprecated accounts should be removed from your subscription
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of deprecated acounts in subscription

metadata.displayName: Function App should only be accessible over HTTPS v2
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of the use of HTTPS in Function App v2

metadata.displayName: Vulnerabilities should be remediated by a Vulnerability Assessment solution
metadata.description: Enable or disable the detection of VM vulnerabilities by a vulnerability assessment solution

metadata.displayName: Azure subscriptions should have a log profile for Activity Log
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of a log profile for Activity Log in subscription

metadata.displayName: List of resource types that should have resource logs enabled
System updates should be installed on your machines
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of system updates reporting

metadata.displayName: Latest TLS version should be used for App Service
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of the latest TLS version in App Service

metadata.displayName: MFA should be enabled accounts with write permissions on your subscription
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of MFA for accounts with write permissions in subscription

metadata.displayName: Microsoft IaaSAntimalware extension should be deployed on Windows servers
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of Windows server VMs without Microsoft IaaSAntimalware extension deployed

metadata.displayName: Web Application should only be accessible over HTTPS v2
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of the use of HTTPS in Web App v2

metadata.displayName: DDoS Protection Standard should be enabled
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of DDoS protection for all virtual networks with a subnet that is part of an application gateway with a public IP.

metadata.displayName: MFA should be enabled on accounts with owner permissions on your subscription
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of MFA for accounts with owner permissions in subscription

metadata.displayName: Advanced data security should be enabled on your SQL servers
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of SQL servers without Advanced Data Security

metadata.displayName: Advanced data security should be enabled on SQL Managed Instance
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of each SQL Managed Instance without advanced data security.

metadata.displayName: Monitor missing endpoint protection in Azure Security Center
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of endpoint protection

metadata.displayName: Just-in-time network access control should be applied on virtual machines
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of network just-in-time access

metadata.displayName: Minimum TLS version
metadata.description: The minimum TLS protocol version that should be enabled. Windows web servers with lower TLS versions will be marked as non-compliant.

metadata.displayName: Service Fabric clusters should only use Azure Active Directory for client authentication
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of Azure Active Directory for client authentication in Service Fabric

metadata.displayName: App Service should only be accessible over HTTPS v2
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of the use of HTTPS v2 in App Service

metadata.displayName: System updates on virtual machine scale sets should be installed
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of virtual machine scale sets system updates reporting

metadata.displayName: Remote debugging should be turned off for Web Application
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of remote debugging for Web App

metadata.displayName: Vulnerabilities in security configuration on your machines should be remediated
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of OS vulnerabilities (based on a configured baseline)

metadata.displayName: MFA should be enabled on accounts with read permissions on your subscription
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of MFA for accounts with read permissions in subscription

metadata.displayName: Enforce password history
metadata.description: Specifies limits on password reuse - how many times a new password must be created for a user account before the password can be repeated.

metadata.displayName: Maximum password age
metadata.description: Specifies the maximum number of days that may elapse before a user account password must be changed. The format of the value is two integers separated by a comma, denoting an inclusive range.

metadata.displayName: Minimum password age
metadata.description: Specifies the minimum number of days that must elapse before a user account password can be changed.

metadata.displayName: Minimum password length
metadata.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters that a user account password may contain.

metadata.displayName: Password must meet complexity requirements
metadata.description: Specifies whether a user account password must be complex. If required, a complex password must not contain part of user's account name or full name; be at least 6 characters long; contain a mix of uppercase, lowercase, number, and non-alphabetic characters.

metadata.displayName: Vulnerabilities in container security configurations should be remediated
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of container benchmark

metadata.displayName: Remote debugging should be turned off for App Service
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of remote debugging for App Service

metadata.displayName: Deprecated accounts with owner permissions should be removed from your subscription
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of deprecated acounts with owner permissions in subscription

metadata.displayName: Vulnerability assessment should be enabled on your SQL servers
metadata.description: Audit Azure SQL servers which do not have recurring vulnerability assessment scans enabled. Vulnerability assessment can discover, track, and help you remediate potential database vulnerabilities.

metadata.displayName: Latest TLS version should be used in your Web App
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of the latest TLS version in Web App

metadata.displayName: Internet-facing virtual machines should be protected with Network Security Groups
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of NSGs on VMs

metadata.displayName: External accounts with owner permissions should be removed from your subscription
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of external acounts with owner permissions in subscription

metadata.displayName: Latest TLS version should be used in your Function App
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of the latest TLS version in Function App

metadata.displayName: SQL databases should have vulnerability findings resolved
metadata.description: Enable or disable the monitoring of Vulnerability Assessment scan results and recommendations for how to remediate database vulnerabilities.
